intro: Pack the Treasure and Master the Challenge!
description:
Have you ever wanted to travel back to the Middle Ages? 
A possibility might have just arisen!


Medieval storages weren’t always known for their proper organization, and this is about to change. While embracing the Medieval era, a challenge is always welcomed in the world of Pimp Up Dungeon. Arrange your weapons, potions and gold to fit everything and find their righteous space!

Dungeons can be dangerous so watch out for traps and other inconveniences. Don’t threaten, if you make a mistake, just try again!

Completing a level grants you gems but be careful because they are awarded for clearing a level without any help. Gems can be used to obtain tips - in case the dungeon gets tricky.


What awaits you:
- 100 challenging levels!
- Leaderboard for those who take gaming seriously.
- Daily scored mission.
- 12 unique items like swords, coins, or potions to place .

Keep in mind that the more precise and careful you are, the higher the rewards so it’s time to sharpen your organizing skills.

Go ahead and start organizing the treasure!
